main.name: Jalen Straka
main.description: I am a highly motivated Full-Stack developer with the desire to solve complicated problems and create exciting applications!
main.bio: I have a passion for learning new skills and tackling complex problems. I enjoy the full-stack spectrum and can comfortably work on all ends of a project. If you need your front-end to dazzle or your back-end to be stable and secure, I'm your person! I have been with my fiancee Amber for almost a decade, we have two beautiful children, Hailey and Malachi. We also have a Siberian Husky named Etho and a HuskyPoo named Miska. My project page isn't updated yet, so please check back again to see everything that I have worked on!
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: This is some, not all, of my competencies.

education.description: A 24 week intensive boot-camp from Trilogy at CWRU, taught by an extremely talented staff of senior developers

work.description: Because of the COVID-19 pandemic, I spent almost the entirety of my bootcamp working remote. We've completed three full scale projects in which I was lead developer and project manager on each of them.

projects.title: Corona No Lines
projects.category: Allows business to real-time update their COVID-19 procedures for consumers to check without having to call-in to find this information.

projects.title: [Event5 Now]
projects.category: Allowing users to check their local weather and if an event is playing that week.

projects.title: MovieClubs
projects.category: Website that allows users to set up and RSVP to movie clubs
